title: Hiriketiya Surfing Bay
details:
Walk To The Beach and Surf In 5 Minutes. 56 Perches. Rectangular Block. 125 Meters From The Beach. 150 Feet Of Main Road Frontage. Enclosed On 3 Sides By A 10 Foot Parapet Wall. Crystal Clear Title. One Owner. Water And Electricity.

Perfect to build a Villa, Guesthouse , Backapckers, Cafe or Restaurant
Rs 850,000/= Per Perch. Price Negotiable For Quick Sale Serious Buyers
